Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: The same permission set as used for VFS resources can also be attached to explorer types. But here the permissions have different meanings. They control which users can create, edit or view contents of the configured type.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Permissions can be set for explorer types. They specify who can add, edit or view a resource of the type. Learn about these permissions here.
